page.title: 08A day in school.
page.content: When we get to school in the morning we have to wait for the teacher to blow the whistle at 9.ooam. Then the teacher sends us in class by class.We hang our coats and bags on our pegs. The first thing is hymn practice. About 9.45am we read or write poems until playtime at 10.30am.When we come in the time is 10.45am. We do maths with each other.The bell goes at 12.00 clock and we go and get washed for lunch. We sit next to each other We finish lunch about 12.30pm.Play ends at 1.15pm and we come in and do science.The bell goes for play we get changed and go on the bars.After play we do athletics or games.After games at 3.45pm we go home.by Cassandra and Donna.
